Package sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
          • sprites.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Removable, java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrier, MovingSprite
    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
implements Drawable
    Anything that takes collides with other sprites and is drawn.
    Version:
    5/5/2018 5:30
    Author:
    Jose
